Return an instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">MappingCost</a> that represents an impossible mapping. <a href="#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper class used to represent the cost for mapping an instruction.

When mapping an instruction, we may introduce some repairing code. In most cases, the repairing code is local to the instruction, thus, we can omit the basic block frequency from the cost. However, some alternatives may produce non-local cost, e.g., when repairing a phi, and thus we then need to scale the local cost to the non-local cost. This class does this for us. 
:::info
: We could simply always scale the cost. The problem is that there are higher chances that we saturate the cost easier and end up having the same cost for actually different alternatives. Another option would be to use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> everywhere.
:::

Definition at line 422 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### ImpossibleCost() {#a7e2284f2c68e1187be7ed8c89a0d6f88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="RegBankSelect::MappingCost RegBankSelect::MappingCost::ImpossibleCost ()"
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return an instance of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">MappingCost</a> that represents an impossible mapping.
